text: 26.18: Ais 35.5; 42.7; 42.16; Zo 8.12; FG 20.32; 2 Ko 6.14; Ef 2.2; Kor 1.13Ndu mben han ŋgɨp mben rɨmgi taaŋrim, mbe mba gɨngɨna thav, ŋaarar zɨrga. Mbe vhɨra Satanan ŋkasŋka thav, Fhe Bakɨme han zɨrga. Gu maaŋ muuŋgip, mbe fhum muuŋgi tɨvi mbatɨgi, gu nta vhɨzgirga. Gu mben tɨvi mbatɨgi vhɨzgirim, mbe zɨ bakɨme ndirga, mba na khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigi, gu mbe farasegi, mbe nan gumgi gu mbigi ma. Mbe mbe phorgɨ kɨrga.’ ”
